tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor Shetty's clinic was an amazing experience. Located at the Ramamurthy Nagar junction, above the Reliance digital, it will not be missed as there is a huge hoarding mentioning clinic's name.I had an appointment for myself and my father booked via practo. 

The first thing you notice about the clinic is the pleasant and welcoming smile of the lady in the reception. After waiting for 15-20 minutes, a
detailed consultation is given by doctor Shetty himself. This by far was the in-depth explanation that I have had regarding my overall oral health. Though the treatment itself is not done by doctor Shetty in person, his colleagues who are assigned for the treatment are around while he examines and prescribes the treatment. In my case, only cleaning and polishing was prescribed in addition to optional replacement of a dental bridge which had a crack. My father had cleaning, polishing and few precautionary fillings suggested. I was attended by doctor Natasha who was really friendly and took utmost care, checking on me from time to time for tooth sensitivity. She gave me valuable suggestions after the treatment. My dad also was pleased with the treatment received.  The after care was also explained in a detailed manner. Doctor Shetty offered free chat services for couple of days in practo if we had any questions. Overall a thoroughly professional institution and I will not have any second thoughts while choosing a dental clinic for my family of six.

The clinic had a promotional offer going on for cleaning and polishing for bookings via practo, which meant that we got the services/treatment worth 3000 at 1500.  They accept both card and cash.

It was a really good experience to visit Dr shettys clinic. I had to get my wisdom tooth extracted and it was a slightly complicated case. All the doctors and assistants were really friendly and helped me understand what the problem was and the diagnosis was explained in detail which helped me to gain confidence. The extraction was done as scheduled and it was really effective. The doctor performed the extraction with so much ease that it was completed in twenty minutes. Again the medicines were prescribed I was also notified of do's and dont's after the extraction which helped in a speedy recovery. I would strongly recommend this place to everyone.

Good ,the doctor and staffs were very kind  ,friendly and polite in handling the patient excellent service, I am very happy that doctor did not confuse me  and he explained the issue what I was into, he prescribed me correct medicine which was very effective, previously when I visited Dr.ghosh he told nothing can't be done because I was diabetic but Dr. Amrith shetty did not panic me about my case and very happy that he has treated me very nicely I wish him to give best service  good luck! Doctor

review: very good experience I got my tooth removal it was a painless treatment I was very comfortable ,the surgeon  communication  with me made me very comfortable  I was scared for the producer but Dr shetty is very profesionerhighly recommended professional

doctor suggested xray for complete mouth and referred to xray shop at basement.doctor prescribed two xray standard and color x-ray (which is mailed). on aksing doc said color x-ray is to identify detailed minute infection.now if color xray tells everything why was normal xray requested ?color xray was shown only on request..doc did not bother to share it. they charged 700 in total for normal toothache xray.

* **** *** *** ********* ******* * **** *** *** **** *** ****** *** **** **** ** ****** ** *** **** ***** **** **** *** the filling I had got done yesterday is already chipping off. I went there seeing Dr Shetty's experience, but he handed over me to some fresher *** **** **** *** ** ****** ******** I will not discourage anybody who is intended to visit doctor Shetty. That was just my opinion. The second reason I visited him is he is very near to my place. I have to go to the other doctor who treated me previous to get my teeth fixed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For years I have dreaded going to the dentist as a result of several bad personal experiences, but that all changed three weeks ago, when I visited the Dr. Shettys Dental care. I experienced a premium level of service from the moment I entered their very clean/modern clinic and was greeted by a very welcoming reception staff. Dr. Amrith Shetty clearly explained the RCT process to me and completed the service painlessly. I had such an unexpectedly positive experience, that I came into the clinic the following week for a tooth crowning  service. I have successfully found a great dentist and now have an even more confident smile.

staff is incredibly professional and knowledgeable, and I would recommend this group to anyone looking for an enjoyable dental experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had a bleeding gums and I lost one of my front tooth and spacing in between my front teeth ,my smile is my strength and confident, I was worried and I visited Dr shetty's dental and consulted Dr Amrith shetty then Dr suggested me a treatment plan I confidently underwent treatment gum laser surgery ,Dr vijetha shetty treated me multiple root canals it was painless treatment and smile designing treatment I have a beautiful smile now thanks Dr shetty ,the supporting staff is good, highly recommended
One of the experiences in dental practice which no one should experience. Filling came out in 5 hrs after paying 4.5k +500+800 in total

Doctor was very gentle and polite. I was here to remove the stitches and had a very good experience and was my first visit. The clinic environment was good and well maintained. Doctor provided the prescription properly. The clinic have in-house pharmacy.

Its really very comfortable to have RCT in Dr. Shetty"s dental care.  The hole RCT treatment is of just 1 hr 10 mins. using latest technology with utmost hospitality.  The diaganitation and the treatment was superb.  Prior to this, about 4 years back, I had bridging.  I feel very comfortable till now.  I feel what ever may be the problem, Dr Shetty's dental care is ultimate. - Vijayandran K, Bangalore.

review: ********* * **** ****** calms down the patient. but here the doctor had no such intention. it seemed like he wanted me to scare into having the extraction as soon as possible.
reply_text: Hi.As discussed earlier the only precise treatment for an infected and impacted wisdom tooth is to get it extracted. The pain killer tablets prescribed will help relieving the pain to some extent.However would recommend not to panic or be scared.U can plan  to get the procedure done at your convenience.please feel free to get in touch with us for further clarification.Thanks for your valuable feedback.
